os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: WinXP

name: Prime Bitcoin Software
short_description:
Prime Bitcoin Software is software that design for you to collect Bitcoin for free. You know many website on internet give you free Bitcoin, but you need to open those website one by one and take much time to do it. With Prime Bitcoin Software you no need to visit website one by one, you only need a few click to do it. With this software you can save much time and do another job.

Prime Bitcoin Software have timer feature and notification info from taskbar. With this you can easy remind that the task has been complete and you can repeat this task to get more Bitcoin. Not only for that, this software also can save your Btcoin Address, so you only need co copy your Bitcoin Address for next used. 

System Requirement :

- Processor : Minimum 1 GHz
- Memory : Minimum 512 Mb  
- HDD : 20 Mb
- Internet Explorer 8 ( IE 6 & IE 7 not supported )
- OS : Windows XP ( Windows 2000 or older not supported )
- Internet Connection.
summary: Awesome software to collect free bitcoin fast and easy to use.
